Test Case Change Classification.Acceptance Criteria - Modified Content: * Validate repository visibility settings (Public/Private) are applied correctly during creation and reflect the selected option post-creation.

Old Test Case Steps: <ol>
• Login to GitHub with valid credentials. [Test Data- Email: valid@email.com, Password: validPassword] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Click on 'New repository' button. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Enter 'my-repo' in the Repository name field. [Test Data- Repository name: my-repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Enter 'Test repo' in the Description field. [Test Data- Description: Test repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Select 'Public' as the visibility option. [Test Data- Visibility: Public] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Click 'Create repository'. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
New Modified Test Case Steps: <ol>
• Login to GitHub with valid credentials. [Test Data- Email: valid@email.com, Password: validPassword] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Click on 'New repository' button. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Enter 'my-repo' in the Repository name field. [Test Data- Repository name: my-repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Enter 'Test repo' in the Description field. [Test Data- Description: Test repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Select 'Public' or 'Private' as the visibility option. [Test Data- Visibility: Public/Private] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Click 'Create repository'. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
• Verify that the repository visibility matches the selected option after creation. [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
Old Expected Results: • 'Create a new repository' page is displayed.
• Repository is created and user is redirected to the new repository page.
New Modified Expected Results: • 'Create a new repository' page is displayed.
• Visibility is set to Public or Private as selected.
• Repository is created and user is redirected to the new repository page.
• Repository visibility matches the selected option after creation.
Test Case Impact Details.What changed in Test Cases Steps & Expec: Steps and expected results updated to validate both 'Public' and 'Private' visibility options and ensure the selected option is reflected post-creation.
